
delinearize(?Linear, -Expression)

   Convert a linear form back to a standard arithmetic expression

Arguments
   Linear              Normalized lists of monomials
   Expression          Arithmetic expression with constants and variables

Type
   library(linearize)

Examples
   
    ?- linearize(3*X-7*Y+2*(X+Y), L, R), delinearize(L, E).
    X = X
    Y = Y
    R = []
    L = [0 * 1, 5 * X, -5 * Y]
    E = 5 * X - 5 * Y
    yes.
    

See Also
   linrenorm / 2, linearize / 3
